title: Fmr. IMF Chief Economist Warns on Fed Independence Risks
description: Gita Gopinath, Harvard economics professor and former IMF chief economist, says rising disagreement inside the Federal Reserve makes communication harder and poses risks to Fed independence. She speaks with Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on “The Close. (Source: Bloomberg)
